title: Josh and Donny's super cool super store for men
subTitle: Agency - CP&B | Client Fruit of the Loom
body:
A tongue-in-cheek web 1.0 site for the fictional Josh and Donny's Supercool Superstore for men. They were leaders in the men's cooling industry until Fruit of the Loom invented breathable underwear. So they paid their cousin $83.50 to build a website using the latest technologies...gifs, to stay competitive.

joshanddonnyssupercoolsuperstoreformen.com
Adweek
awwwards
